It's an unhinged one,'' said Jim Cantiello about the entertaining, unpredictable shenanigans pulled out by Steven Tyler in the first two nights of audition episodes this week. Truth be told, I never realized how much I missed Paula[ Abdul] last year. Steven Tyler 's colorful language, zany metaphors and deafening jangly man-jewelry was just the entertaining wild card the two-night premiere needed to give it a must-see facelift. Jim Cantiello was glad that the new trio, which also includes sole returning judge Randy Jackson , didn't fall into the same old`` mean Simon Cowell '' and`` too-nice Paula'' tropes. the Internet giant. Eric Schmidt sells shares In a regulatory filing last week, Google said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of December 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google stock and controlled 9.6 per cent of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000 shares of

Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web,'' he said.
